alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 31 at 5:51AM AKST until January 02 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...High winds could move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chill values will be 15 below to 30 below in these strong winds.
info.instruction: A high wind watch means there is potential for a hazardous high wind event. Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
